title: Creating a Team
body:
Looking to create a team. Ranks do not matter. Just wanting to create a team for fun and getting the rewards from it aswell. Not really wanting young players if you have a really high pitched voice. 

All i want from you if interested is :

IGN 
Rank
Skype Y/N 
Role
Secondary role
Age

replies.body:
IGN: DerGundi
Rank: B2
Skype: Yes 
Role: Mid Lane (Azir, Leblanc, LuLu, Oriana and alot more.
Secondary role Jungle (Elise, Shyvana, Reksai, Khazix, Rengar)
Age: 16

Thanks
